WELCOME.title: –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç
WELCOME.message_en:
Hello, tourist\! üòä

I am your AI assistant for planning ideal walks around Nizhny Novgorod\. I will help you find interesting places near you and create a personal itinerary\.

Are you ready to conquer the hometown of Maxim Gorky, Natalia Vodianova, Mark Edelstein and other celebrities\? Then click the "Make a walk plan" button\!

CAPABILITIES.title: –ß—Ç–æ —É–º–µ–µ—Ç –±–æ—Ç
CAPABILITIES.message_en:
üìå *What can I do\?\.\.\.*

Hmm, let's tell you point by point:

1 ‚Äî I'm making up a route from your current location
2 ‚Äî I select locations according to your interests \(history, art, sports, panoramas, and much more\)
3 \- I calculate the time of the walk and create a timeline \(schedule\)
4 ‚Äî I explain why each place is worth your precious attention :\)

Just click on "Make a walking plan" and I will prepare for you the program of your grand tour of the sunset capital\!

INTERESTS_QUESTION.title: –í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å 1 - –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã
INTERESTS_QUESTION.message_en:
*Step 1 of 3*

**Tell us about your interests in a free form\.** What would you like to do\? What to see while walking through the streets of the sunset capital\?

For example, you can write:
"I like music and modern art," "I love enjoying the embankments," "I love active recreation, sports\!" and the like\.

You can combine any interests\! Describe them in your own words\.

INTERESTS_CONFIRMATION.title: –ü–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–≤
INTERESTS_CONFIRMATION.message_en:
Please confirm your answer\!

If you want to answer the question again, click on the "Reset interests" button
If you want to add to the answer, click on the "Add more interests" button
And finally, if you do not want to change the answer, click on the "That's right" button

If you want to cancel the process of selecting a walking plan for Nizhny Novgorod, click Cancel

üï∞Ô∏è *Step 2 of 3*

LOCATION_QUESTION.message_en:
*Step 3 of 3*

Please indicate your location so that I can plot the route of your grandiose mini\-trip around the capital of the Volga region\.
